name: Kamakshi'sSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, Turn On The Curtains”
”Alexa, Change The Channel To 506 On TV”
”Alexa, Set The AC Temperature To 23 Degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Please add the Skill Kamakshi's Smart Home to your Skills

When you enable skill the you will be redirected to Page for Authentication. If not, check the popup blocker of your browser.

Use the username and password created on Kamakshi Cloud's Smart Home site to authenticate.

Once you are Authenticated you can go back to your Alexa App Page. You an tell Alexa Echo Dot to "Discover Devices" or Click Discover Devices in Devices section of Smart Home tab.

You will see various Devices in the device list. Now you can give commands as follows:

TV & Entertainment
- Alexa Switch on/off the TV
- Alexa, Change The Channel To 506 On TV
- Alexa, Mute/Unmute TV

Airconditioning
- Alexa, Switch on/off the AC
- Alexa, Set The AC Temperature To 23 Degrees

Lights
- Alexa, Switch on/off the Entrance Light
- Alexa, Switch on/off the Bed Light
- Alexa, Switch on/off the Ceiling Light
- Alexa, Switch on/off the Lamp
- Alexa, Switch on/off the Bathroom Light
- Alexa, Switch on/off the Room Lights (this is turn all of them)

Curtain
- Alexa, Turn on/off the curtains
